### Signals in {{category}}

<!-- Gauge colour: less than 10% = primary, less than 50% = warning, else = danger -->

```{r}
n_signals <- signals_agg %>% dplyr::filter(category == "{{category}}")
gauge(
 value = sum(n_signals$n_alarms),
 min = 0, max = nrow(n_signals) * params$number_of_weeks,
 label = "Signals",
 sectors = gaugeSectors(
   success = c(0, 0.1*nrow(n_signals)),
   warning = c(0.1*nrow(n_signals), 0.5*nrow(n_signals)),
   danger = c(0.5*nrow(n_signals), nrow(n_signals)),
   colors = c("primary", "warning", "danger")
 )
)
```
